wikitext.*:
{{song | title=They're taking the Hobbits to Isengard | composer=[[Howard Shore]] | arranger=Erwin Beekveld | writer=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
[[Frances Walsh]]
[[Philippa Boyens]]
[[Peter Jackson]]
[[Stephen Sinclair]] | performer=[[Orlando Bloom]]
[[Andy Serkis]]
[[Marton Csokas]] | additionalcredits= | image=The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - They're taking the Hobbits to Isengard!.jpeg | duration=2:09 | track= | previous= | next= | spotify= | youtube=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2X-AF7fOzW0 | soundcloud= }} '''They're taking the Hobbits to Isengard''' is a 2005 music video made by Erwin Beekveld ([[1969]] - [[31 March]] [[2022]]).[https://www.discogs.com/es/artist/3862287-Erwin-Beekveld Erwin Beekveld] on discogs.com (accessed 27 June 2023) It is a mix of footage from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]''. The song is formed around the phrase, uttered by [[Legolas]], "They're taking the Hobbits to Isengard". This line is spoken in ''The Two Towers'', when Legolas spots the [[Uruk-hai]] and extrapolates their objective from the direction in which they run. It should be noted that Legolas states the Uruks turned north-east - a direction which would not lead them to Isengard, but straight back at the pursuers. The actual direction should be north-west. The lyrics are scrambled lines from Legolas, [[Gollum]] and [[Celeborn]]. Footage of [[Frodo Baggins]], [[Peregrin Took]], [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]], [[Aragorn]], [[Gimli]], [[Galadriel]] and [[Samwise Gamgee]] is also shown. The music is a computerized mix of two themes of [[Howard Shore]]'s music; "[[The Shire (soundtrack)|The Shire]]" theme and "[[The Ring Goes South (soundtrack)|The Ring Goes South]]" theme. ==Lyrics== '''[[Legolas]]''': They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard|Isengard-gard-gard-gard-gard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard|Isengard-gard-gard-gardgard-gard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! '''[[Gollum]]''': What did you say? The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! To [[Isengard]]! The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! To [[Isengard]]! The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]]-The [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! To [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard|Isengard-gard-gardgard-gard-gard]]! '''[[Celeborn]]''': Tell me, where is [[Gandalf]]? For I much desire to speak with him. Tell me, where is [[Gandalf]]? For I much desire to speak with him. '''[[Legolas]]''': A [[Balrog]] of [[Morgoth]]. '''[[Gollum]]''': What did you say? '''[[Legolas]]''': A [[Balrog]] of [[Morgoth]]. '''[[Gollum]]''': What did you say? '''[[Legolas]]''': They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! '''[[Gollum]]''': Stupid fat [[Hobbit]]! '''[[Legolas]]''': They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! '''[[Gollum]]''': Stupid fat [[Hobbit]]! '''[[Legolas]]''': They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! They're taking the [[Hobbits]] to [[Isengard]]! '''[[Gollum]]''': Stupid fat [[Hobbit]]! Leave! Now! And never come back! ==External links== * [https://web.archive.org/web/20150429050325/http://www.beekveld.com/ Erwin Beekveld's website] at Web Archive * "[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NGguk8VXYc&ab_channel=PeterJackson Goodbye Orlando]" on [[Peter Jackson]]'s YouTube channel ([[Orlando Bloom]] singing to the video on his last day filming [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]) {{references}} {{Fan films}} [[Category:Fan films]] [[Category:Songs (real-world)]]
